seo_content:
Exclusive City Traders Imperium Trading Offer

City Traders Imperium, based in the United Arab Emirates, was established in July 2018. It is a CFD firm offering Instant, 1 Step, and 2 Steps programs. Initial funding amounts range from $1,000 to over $100,000. Platforms supported are MT5 and Match market participant. CTI is now both a prop trading company and a broker (CTI Markets). checked by our [Intelligence Hub](/) for prop trading excellence.
